title: called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Canceled
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
```
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:85] ["Welcome to TiKV"]
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:90] ["Release Version:   6.5.0-alpha"]
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:90] ["Edition:           Community"]
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:90] ["Git Commit Hash:   d86a449d7f5b656cef28576f166e73291f501d77"]
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:90] ["Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.5.0-alpha"]
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:90] ["UTC Build Time:    Unknown (env var does not exist when building)"]
[2022/12/11 19:57:10.635 +00:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:90] ["Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)"]
```
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
Run append-optimistic-rc-async-follower-syserr

### What did you expect?


### What did happened?
[2022/12/11 19:58:55.006 +00:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:495] ["called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Canceled"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
